articles.title: HBO Max has been busted for days
articles.description: HBO Max’s ongoing issues on the Apple TV are pinned to an app update introduced June 5th. Users have reported that basic playback functionality — such as fast-forwarding, rewinding, and pausing — is currently not supported on the streaming app.
